name: Space Hit
description: On SPACE HIT you finished your space mission, and it's just time to come back home, but your journey will not be so easy as you think...
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 64 bits Processor: Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb dedicated, Compatible with Open GL 2.1 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bits Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: any
